description: A peculiar eleven-year-old child and "the cargo." Alvis (or "Al") is targeted by the Guild and it becomes apparent that she is the "key to Exile." Her nurse, Guita, and the pilot who was commissioned to transport her, Ralph Wednesday, were killed as a result of the Guild`s pursuit. Claus Valca tended to Ralph when he crash landed and that`s how they met Al.
name: Alvis Hamilton
